achievements.label: Opposing Blades
achievements.descriptionLocked: You and your opposing blade will Strife and contend against each other until the war's end.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: You and your opposing blade will Strife and contend against each other until the war's end.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'You and your opposing blade will Strife and contend against each other until the war's end.' [In Stalingrad, you cornered your arch-nemesis, and thus you became a pair of opposing blades.

achievements.label: Strife and Opposition
achievements.descriptionLocked: You and your opposing blade will Strife and contend against each other until the war's end. [Reverse Victory]
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>'You and your opposing blade will Strife and contend against each other until the war's end.'<i>

[In Stalingrad, you were cornered by your arch-nemesis, and thus you became a pair of opposing blades.]

achievements.label: The Fall of the Iron Eater
achievements.descriptionLocked: Your arch-nemesis has unhorsed Blade Eternal.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'Your arch-nemesis has unhorsed Blade Eternal.' [In a duel, Von Heiling defeated the Iron Eater.]

achievements.label: The Lion-Rat Duel
achievements.descriptionLocked: Your arch-nemesis has been through a lion-rat duel.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'Your arch-nemesis has been through a lion-rat duel.' [Together with a continental enemy, you assaulted Von Heiling.]

achievements.label: The Great Enemy Vanquished
achievements.descriptionLocked: You have overcome your arch-nemesis in a Strife.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: You have overcome your arch-nemesis in a Strife.
achievements.unlockMessage: 'You have overcome your arch-nemesis in a Strife.' [You have defeated Von Heiling.]
